title: Define Project Scope and Requirements (Revised)
description: Gather and document comprehensive requirements for the AIVetAssistant system. This includes: defining the list of common pet ailments to be covered, setting achievable but high diagnostic accuracy goals, designing an intuitive user interface for veterinarians, addressing data privacy and security concerns, outlining integration with current veterinary software systems, specifying scalability requirements for future growth, and considering edge cases and error handling scenarios. Additionally, consider performance optimizations and detail the approach to maintaining data quality. Lastly, ensure the requirements document is well-structured, easily accessible, and regularly updated.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the AIVetAssistant system, including the components for data ingestion, model training, inference, and user interface.

title: Set up Development Environment
description: Set up the development environment, including version control, continuous integration/deployment pipelines, and any necessary infrastructure.

title: Implement Data Ingestion and Preprocessing
description: Develop the components for ingesting and preprocessing pet health data, including medical records, symptoms, and diagnostic information.

title: Train AI Diagnostic Model
description: Develop and train the AI model for diagnosing pet ailments based on the ingested data.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for veterinarians to input pet information and receive diagnostic recommendations.

title: Integrate System Components
description: Integrate the data ingestion, AI model, and user interface components into a cohesive system.

title: Conduct System Testing
description: Perform comprehensive testing of the AIVetAssistant system, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.

title: Address Security Concerns
description: Identify and address potential security concerns related to data privacy, system access, and model integrity.

title: Prepare Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the AIVetAssistant system, including user guides, technical documentation, and maintenance procedures.

title: Deploy and Monitor System
description: Deploy the AIVetAssistant system to a production environment and implement monitoring and maintenance procedures.
